免疫细胞水平高的三阴性乳腺癌患者术后复发风险较低患有三阴性乳腺癌且肿瘤中免疫细胞水平较高的女性，即使不进行化疗，术后复发风险也较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Triple-阴性-breast-cancer-患者-with-high-immune-cell-levels-have-lower-relapse-risk-after-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Triple-阴性-breast-cancer-患者-with-high-immune-cell-levels-have-lower-relapse-risk-after-surgery.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac13a4dc-835d-4cc1-84b6-be4e9091491b Wed, 17 Apr 2024 07:04:22 -0400 Triple-negative breast cancer patients with high immune cell levels have lower relapse risk after surgery

DASH 饮食可降低乳腺癌幸存者患心血管疾病的风险牛津大学出版社在 JNCI Cancer Spectrum 上发表的一篇新论文发现，遵循健康饮食可以降低乳腺癌幸存者患心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/DASH-diet-may-lower-the-risk-of-cardioangio-disease-in-breast-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/DASH-diet-may-lower-the-risk-of-cardioangio-disease-in-breast-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a79465fc-7abc-4d23-b799-23a9e1232237 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 06:51:35 -0400 DASH diet may lower the risk of cardiovascular disease in breast cancer survivors

帕丽斯·希尔顿支持加州法案，要求对“陷入困境的青少年产业”给予阳光名人酒店女继承人帕丽斯·希尔顿 (Paris Hilton) 支持加州立法者推动提高寄宿青少年治疗中心的透明度，要求这些项目报告在管教未成年人时使用约束或隔离室的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Paris-Hilton-backs-California-bill-requiring-sunshine-on-e28098troubled-teen-industrye28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Paris-Hilton-backs-California-bill-requiring-sunshine-on-e28098troubled-teen-industrye28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=019235d4-51ea-4767-ad16-2cb470d19206 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 06:35:32 -0400 Paris Hilton backs California bill requiring sunshine on ‘troubled teen industry’
为了阻止费城芬太尼死亡，挨家挨户发放过量用药包在费城北部肯辛顿街区一条狭窄的街道上，街道两旁排列着排屋和一家汽车修理厂，马塞拉·埃利 (Marsella Elie) 爬上一户人家的前台阶，用力敲门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/To-stop-fentanyl-deaths-in-Philadelphia-knocking-on-doors-and-handing-out-overdose-kits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/To-stop-fentanyl-deaths-in-Philadelphia-knocking-on-doors-and-handing-out-overdose-kits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83d7dbb5-9b64-440b-a5b1-9cc7ced1f810 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 06:33:51 -0400 To stop fentanyl deaths in Philadelphia, knocking on doors and handing out overdose kits
研究发现微剂量 LSD 可以延长睡眠时间：对照试验的见解一项 I 期试验，旨在评估微剂量麦角酸二乙酰胺 (LSD) 对睡眠的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Study-finds-microdosing-LSD-leads-to-longer-sleep-Insights-from-a-control-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Study-finds-microdosing-LSD-leads-to-longer-sleep-Insights-from-a-control-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34c014bb-26ed-40e6-a580-44d8c72d821f Wed, 17 Apr 2024 05:58:00 -0400 Study finds microdosing LSD leads to longer sleep: Insights from a controlled trial
新的遗传学见解：含糖饮料与心房颤动的较高风险有关纯果汁（PFJ）和含糖饮料（SSB）的摄入与心血管疾病（CVD）之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/New-genic-insights-Sugary-beverages-linked-to-higher-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/New-genic-insights-Sugary-beverages-linked-to-higher-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d5e01a6-a9da-4d62-a7f4-2f77a1c65be8 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 05:11:00 -0400 New genetic insights: Sugary beverages linked to higher risk of atrial fibrillation

ELRIG UK 和 SRG 宣布建立合作伙伴关系，以促进生命科学专业人员在药物发现方面的发展英国欧洲实验室研究与创新小组 (ELRIG) 是一个非营利性、志愿者领导的药物发现界组织，今天与生命科学招聘领域的领导者 SRG 建立了合作伙伴关系，以支持科学专业人员的进步在他们的职业生涯中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/ELRIG-UK-and-SRG-announce-partnership-to-advance-life-science-professionals-in-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/ELRIG-UK-and-SRG-announce-partnership-to-advance-life-science-professionals-in-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=290a7205-24d5-426b-8cea-e1b081d10815 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 03:54:00 -0400 ELRIG UK and SRG announce partnership to advance life science professionals in drug discovery
